## Load Data

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
```

```{r}
raw_dir <- "/group_08_project/data/_raw/"
data_file <- "GSE182951_Counts_All_Samples.xlsx"
data_loc <- "https://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE182nnn/GSE182951/suppl/GSE182951%5FCounts%5FAll%5FSamples%2Exlsx"

if( !dir.exists(raw_dir) ){
  dir.create(path = raw_dir)
}
if( !file.exists(str_c(raw_dir, data_file)) ){
  download.file(
    url = str_c(data_loc),
    destfile = str_c(raw_dir, data_file))
}
load(file = str_c(raw_dir, data_file))
```
